Title: Enacts "Kimberly's Law"
Summary: Enacts "Kimberly's Law" establishing certain sex offenses, including sex offenses against children; relates to criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sex offenses.
LawCode: Amd Pen L, generally; amd ยง168-a, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the correction law, in relation to establishing certain sex offenses and criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sex offenses
